dynamic-element.name: content
dynamic-element.dynamic-content:
Out of This World
Come to the Lunar Resort and live out your childhood dream of being an astronaut on the Moon. If that's not enough incentive, you'll enjoy a luxurious 3 day 2 night stay in our fabulous Lunar accomodations. Enjoy a round of Lunar Golf on our one of a kind course. Have a blast on our Rover Racing track. Make your reservation now. The rest of your life starts today!
